Text: K-Katagiri-san...
Oh, sorry. Did you wait long?\nSorry for calling you here...
It's fine. What's up?
Um...
I wanted to ask you something...
...Do you dislike girls who are rough around the edges?
No, I like them... Why?
Ｏｈ ｗａｉｔ, just a moment...
That's not the real reason I called you.
There's something I really want to tell you...
Ah...
I know I may not have seemed that way,\nsince I talk to everyone easily...
...but when I talk with you, I feel the most relaxed.
I only realized this recently.
The thought of graduating and not being able to see you anymore...
It made me really sad, and I didn't know what to do...
I'm a pretty easy-going person, but I've thought seriously\nabout this, and I've made up my mind.
It's really embarrassing for a girl to say this,\nbut I want you to hear my true feelings...
Just listen to them, that is enough.
Ｉ'ｌｌ ｍｉｓｓ ｙｏｕ.
I feel lonely without you...\nSo... So, please...
Didn't I say earlier that I like girls\nthat are rough around the edges?
Actually... I meant I like you, Katagiri-san.
Oh my goodness, I can't believe it! Really?
I wouldn't joke at a time like this.
Ah, ah... Ｕｎｂｅｌｉｅｖａｂｌｅ!! I can't believe it...
This is the happiest day of my life!\nＩ'ｌｌ ｎｅｖｅｒ ｆｏｒｇｅｔ!
I'll remember it as long as I live...!
A-Asahina-san...
I don't know why I called you out here...
But there's something I want to say before graduation...\nHow can I say it?
Something you want to say...?
I used to love going to all the trendy places\nand follow fads, but...
I don't know how to explain it.\nLately, I've gotten tired of it.
I feel like, if I'm with someone I like,\nI'll have fun no matter where we go!
Like right now, being with you feels that way.
So you've gotten tired of it, huh?
You're such an idiot sometimes.\nI'm saying that being with you is fun for me!
W-What does that mean...?
It's embarrassing to say, but...
I think... I've fallen for you.
As long as I have you, I don't need anything else!\nI don't care about trends anymore.
So, please, go out with me.
Actually, I... I've liked you too, Asahina-san...
That's amazing, I'm so happy!
But still, isn't it more fun to go somewhere,\nrather than just being together all the time?
Y-Yeah, you're right.
Then, once we graduate, let's go on a trip somewhere!
Sure, sounds good.
Then let's head to the travel agency right now. Come on, hurry, hurry!
(Well, she hasn’t changed at all... but I guess that's okay.)
K-Kiyokawa-san...
Sorry for calling you out here.
It's fine, really. What's wrong?
Since we're graduating today, there’s something I really need to tell you.\nJust listening is enough...
Yeah... I'll listen.
Up until now, I've only focused on swimming,\nI never had time for love or romance...
...and the guys around me were all so weak,\nnone of them ever caught my interest.
So I never paid any attention to that stuff.
But lately, something changed, and I don't know when.
I started to think more and more about you...
I couldn't even focus on my training anymore.
Lately, I can’t even sleep at night...
...and my heart has been restless.
People have always told me that I look like a boy,\nbut that never bothered me.
But with you... I don't want you to see me that way.
That’s why I’ve tried not to speak roughly in front of you,\nand I’ve even watched how I act.
If none of that’s enough, then I’ll give up swimming.
I’ll grow my hair out as long as you want it!
S-Sorry...  know I’m saying all these selfish things...
But it’s okay if you reject me.
I just don’t want to graduate with these feelings bottled up.
I wanted you to hear how I feel...
Okay...
I love you.
So much I can't sleep at night.
I-I see, of course!!
Of course, someone like me isn’t good enough!
But at least I feel relieved having said it.\nThank you for listening.
K-Kiyokawa-san. Wait.
Don’t stop me. If you stop me, I’ll start hoping.
And if you say something just to comfort me,\nI’ll feel miserable...
Kiyokawa-san. I love you too.
W-what did you just say...?
I said, I love you, Kiyokawa-san.
R-Really? Even someone like me,\nwho's only good at swimming...?
Of course.
I-I can't... Now I can't stop crying...
Please...
Let me cry in your arms.
It's okay.
I’m so happy. This is the best feeling ever...
H-Himoo-san...
You kept me waiting.
N-no... sorry... for calling you out to a place like this.
What's wrong, Himoo-san? You're acting strange...
It's f-fine. I've decided to change, starting today.
Huh? Change?
Yes, change.
Until now, I've been looking down on others because of my own talent.
I've been a girl that anyone would find annoying.
I used to mock girls who cared about things like love and romance.
But at some point...
I started to feel something new, stirring inside me...
Then, I realized I had fallen for you.
But I’m a woman who sold her soul to the demon of science.
I wanted to suppress it.
I experimented with that.
But graduation kept coming...
And those feelings grew stronger,\nuntil I couldn't hold them back anymore.
That’s why I challenged you to a fight...
Because I wanted to completely deny those emotions.
The result... well, I don’t have to say it...
I lost to you in every possible way.
I don’t want to even think about you hating me anymore...
I’m abandoning my ambitions of world domination!
Because now, my only ambition is for you to like me...
To tell you the truth... I also like you, Himoo-san...
R-Really?
Then, my ambition has been fulfilled!
I'm so happy...
Even if I had taken over the world,\nI don’t think I could have been this happy...
I’m happy, too!
I'll try harder and harder... to become a girl you like even more.
Sh-Shiori-san?
I'm sorry to call you out to a place like this.
There’s something I really need to tell you today...
What's wrong, Shiori?
I’ve... never dated a boy before...
But it’s not because I wasn’t interested.
I wanted to try dating, too. I’ve even gotten several love letters before!
But I just couldn’t bring myself to date anyone...
W-Why not?
Because of you...
Because you were always by my side...
Until now, I thought of you as just a childhood friend...
No, maybe I convinced myself of that...
Because I was scared of you realizing how I truly felt.
But now that we’re graduating...\nNow that we might go our separate ways...
I’ve finally come to realize these feelings.
It's embarrassing to say... and I want to run away...
...but I don't want us to just be childhood friends anymore.
I want you to see me as a girl, to see only me.
So I’m gathering my courage to tell you...
I love you.
More than anyone else in the entire world, I love you...
To tell the truth...\nI’ve also loved you, Shiori...
H-huh?
I’m so happy, but... I can’t stop crying!
I can really believe this, right? You really mean it?
Of course I do. I love you, Shiori.
I'm happy... I'm so happy...
Please, never let me go...
Oh, Kagami-san.
I'm sorry for calling you out to a place like this.
W-Wait, did Kagami-san just apologize...?
Oh, there's no need to be so surprised.
But, please, listen to what I have to say.
I moved to this town back when I was in middle school.
In my last town... I got dumped by boys so many times.
So, when I came here, I thought...
I’ll reinvent myself. I’ll make boys want me,\nand I'll be the one doing the dumping.
With a lot of effort, I became that girl.
And then, I took on this high and mighty attitude,\nand sought my revenge.
S-So that’s how it was...
At first, it was fun... I was happy to be admired by boys.
But it didn’t satisfy my heart.
Of course it didn’t. Living a lie could never fulfill me.
If I hadn’t met you, I might never have realized this...
Meeting you made me think about a lot of stuff.
If it was with you, I could finally abandon this charade!
Except... I didn’t have the courage to give up who I had become.
I didn’t want to go back to my old self...
But now I finally found this courage!
I can’t stand the thought of graduating\nwhile you still think of me as this kind of girl!
You're different from the others...
I just want you by my side. Only you can heal the scars in my heart.
I love you. Stay with me forever... Please...
So that’s how it is...
Still, I'm probably not good enough, am I?
No, not at all! I'm here for you.
Really? That makes me so happy!\nI can finally be my true self.
But the other guys might hate me, you know?
It’s okay. You’re the one I chose.
No one else would dare complain.
Yeah, right. We'll see about that...
Eh? Who are you?
Have we met somewhere before?
I... I’m Ijuuin.
Ijuuin? I don’t remember him having a sister.
No... I’m Ijuuin Rei.
Eh?
I’m sorry. All this time,\nI’ve been pretending to be a boy... lying to you.
That’s... quite a lie.
In the Ijuuin family, girls are required to live as boys\noutside the house until they graduate.
Like in a manga...
But I... Even though there was only one day left,\nI couldn’t take it anymore.
I’m sorry for calling you out like this.
I-It’s fine. Really...
I’m sorry for always being so harsh with you...
But the truth is, I said all those things\nbecause I wanted you to hate me.
I thought that if you hated me, I could forget about you...
But no matter how awful I was, you kept calling me...
Even after I said such terrible things,\nyou kept calling me, over and over.
And every time, I cried on the other end of the line,\nbecause I was so happy!
And when I was kidnapped...\nyou even went to that abandoned factory to save me.
I couldn’t believe someone would worry about me like that.
I’ve always tried to live strong, but...
I’m just a normal girl.
I wanted to hang out with everyone, chat, and go out like normal.
Even on Valentine’s Day, I wanted to...
Starting tomorrow, I’ll finally be able to live like that.\nBut right now, I want you to see the real me.
I don’t care about the Ijuuin family anymore.
So... I love you.
I’m sorry for lying to you all this time.
But... will you go out with me?
Ijuuin... No, Ijuuin-san...
I know this might be a bother, but...\nPlease tell me how you feel.
If I can hear it, maybe I can give up...
There’s no way I could reject someone who likes me so much.
R-Really...?
Of course. The answer is yes.
I... I don’t even know what to say...
I finally feel like I’ve become a normal girl...
Can I ask you one thing, though?
Hm?
That time when Takayoshi collapsed...
I-I'm sorry... When Takayoshi-kun realized that I was a girl,\nI had to alter his memory.
I thought so...
Do you... despise me for it?
No... I understand why you did it...
Thank you... You’re so kind...
I’m so glad I fell in love with you!
Ah, you're...
I’m sorry for everything up until now.
My name is Miharu Tatebayashi.
I called you out here because...
...there’s something I absolutely have to tell you!
Something you have to tell me?
All those times I bumped into you...\nWell, it wasn’t by coincidence.
Yeah, I figured out that much.
I-I see...!
The truth is, I fell in love with you at first sight.\nI've always been watching you!
So I did those things...\nbecause I wanted you to at least remember my face.
I’m so sorry.
I-I see... So that's what happened...
Umm... I know it’s selfish after what I did, but...
I still believe in love at first sight.\nPlease go out with me!
Actually, I’ve also been thinking about you, Tatebayashi-san.
So... is that an OK!?
I’m so happy!!!
Let’s get to know each other from now on!
Yeah, let's.
K-Kisaragi-san...
I'm sorry. I know it's rude, but...
I called you here because there’s something\nI absolutely have to tell you today.
It's fine, please go ahead.
I’ve always been weak physically,\nso I didn’t have many friends.
My only real hobby has been reading books.
And every time I read, I found myself\nadmiring the romances in those stories...
...but also feeling a little jealous.
It made me ashamed of myself,\ntoo timid to share my real feelings.
I’ve always hated that about me...
But starting today, I want to change who I’ve been.
W-Why today?
I've read many books, and in my memory,\nthere are countless stories...
But I don't want my time in high school,\nmy time with you, to be just another memory!
I don't want to let it be just another one of my fantasies...
So, with all the courage I have in my lifetime, I'll say it...
I love you.
Even if we’re just friends, that’s okay.
As long as I can keep seeing you, even after graduation...
To tell you the truth...
I’ve also been thinking about you, Kisaragi-san...
Re-Really...?
You’d really accept someone like me...?
Of course.
I love you, Kisaragi-san.
I’m so happy... Ah!
Oh no, be careful, Kisaragi-san!
*giggles*
Being weak isn’t so bad after all.
Because it means I get to be held by you like this...
Please, let us stay like this for just a little longer...
Y-Yumi-chan...
I-I’m sorry...!
For calling you out to a place like this...
No, it’s fine.
Umm...
Yumi has always wanted to be in the same grade as you, senpai.
If we were in the same grade...
We could’ve spent all three years of high school together...
Even gone on the school trip together...
I’ve cried so many times... why couldn’t I have been born\nwhen my big brother was born instead...?
Yumi knows that compared to the girls in your grade,\nYumi seems childish and selfish.
But if you don’t like that I’m childish,\nI’ll work hard to be more mature!
I’ll stop being selfish too!
So please...
Don’t think of me as your friend’s little sister anymore.
I want you to see me as a girl!
Because senpai, I love you more than anything else in this world...\nAnd I can't help it!
Actually... I’ve also been thinking about you, Yumi-chan...
Re-Really?
You don’t mind that I’m younger?
Of course not. I love you, Yumi-chan.
Then... can I have the second button from your uniform?
Sure. Here you go.
Yay!
I’ll keep this as my good luck charm\nand do my best for another year!
Even after you graduate, please come to visit.\nNot to see my brother, but to see Yumi!
If you don’t, Yumi will be lonely and cry!
I promise. I’ll come visit.
I’m so happy!!
I love you, senpai.
(Though, if we get married...
I’ll technically become Yoshio’s brother-in-law...)
